trans-unit.source: Use the classes in this namespace to provide counter data.
trans-unit.target: 使用此命名空間中的類別以提供計數器資料。

trans-unit.source: The counters are used to expose performance metrics to consumers such as the Performance Monitor.
trans-unit.target: 計數器是用來向取用者公開效能指標，例如效能監視器。

trans-unit.source: The namespace does not contain classes for consuming the counter data.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間未包含取用計數器資料的類別。

trans-unit.source: For a complete description of the performance counters architecture, see <see href="https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa373083\(v=vs.85\">Performance Counters</see>.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 如需效能計數器架構的完整說明，請參閱<see href="https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa373083\(v=vs.85\">效能計數器</see>.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: The classes in this namespace support the new architecture (version 2.0) for performance counters that was introduced in Windows Vista.
trans-unit.target: 此命名空間中的類別支援 Windows Vista 中導入的效能計數器 （2.0 版） 的新架構。

trans-unit.source: In the new architecture, the provider no longer responds to consumer requests directly, but instead simply maintains the counter data.
trans-unit.target: 在新的架構，提供者不會再直接回應取用者要求，但改為只需維護的計數器資料。

trans-unit.source: The system injects a thread into the provider's process when the provider creates an instance of the counter set; the thread is responsible for handling consumer requests.
trans-unit.target: 系統執行緒到提供者的程序時插入此提供者建立的執行個體的計數器集合。執行緒負責處理取用者要求。

trans-unit.source: The following steps show the process for writing a counters provider.
trans-unit.target: 下列步驟示範撰寫計數器提供者的程序。

trans-unit.source: The counters that the provider provides is defined in an XML-based manifest.
trans-unit.target: 以 XML 為基礎的資訊清單中定義的提供者提供的計數器。

trans-unit.source: The counters are logically grouped into counter sets.
trans-unit.target: 計數器會以邏輯方式分組為計數器集合。

trans-unit.source: The counters within a counter set are identified by a numeric identifier that is unique within the counter set.
trans-unit.target: 計數器集合內的計數器的計數器集合內必須是唯一的數值識別碼來識別。

trans-unit.source: A provider can define one or more counter sets.
trans-unit.target: 提供者可以定義一個或多個計數器集合。

trans-unit.source: A counter set is identified by a Guid that is unique to a provider.
trans-unit.target: 計數器集合識別提供者的唯一 Guid。

trans-unit.source: Note that if you use these classes to write your provider:
trans-unit.target: 請注意，如果您使用這些類別來撰寫您的提供者：

trans-unit.source: The callback attribute of the provider element is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 提供者項目的回呼屬性會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The reference value for the name attribute of the counterAttribute element is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 已忽略 counterAttribute 項目的 name 屬性的參考值。

trans-unit.source: For details on writing the manifest, see [Performance Counters Schema](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa373092\(v=vs.85\).aspx).
trans-unit.target: 如需寫入資訊清單的詳細資訊，請參閱[效能計數器的結構描述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa373092\(v=vs.85\).aspx)。

trans-unit.source: After writing your manifest, use the [CTRPP](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa372128\(v=vs.85\).aspx) tool to compile the manifest (ctrpp provider.man).
trans-unit.target: 撰寫您的資訊清單之後，請使用[CTRPP](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa372128\(v=vs.85\).aspx)工具来編譯的資訊清單 (ctrpp provider.man)。

trans-unit.source: The tool generates four files: .h, .c, .rc, and *_r.h.
trans-unit.target: 此工具會產生四個檔案：.h、.c、.rc，和 * _r.h。

trans-unit.source: You can ignore the .h and .c files.
trans-unit.target: 您可以忽略的.h 和.c 檔。

trans-unit.source: The .rc file contains the localized strings defined in your manifest.
trans-unit.target: .Rc 檔會包含在您的資訊清單中定義的當地語系化的字串。

trans-unit.source: You use the .rc and *_r.h files to create the compiled resource file (.res) that you include in your project.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用的.rc 和 *_r.h 檔案來建立您在您的專案中包含已編譯的資源檔 (.res)。

trans-unit.source: The following call shows how to compile the resource file:
trans-unit.target: 下列呼叫會示範如何編譯資源檔：

trans-unit.source: If you get an error that references sal.h, copy the sal.h file from your Microsoft Visual Studio, Visual C include directory to the directory you specify for the /i switch.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到錯誤參考 sal.h header，複製 sal.h header 檔案從您的 Microsoft Visual Studio，Visual C 包含至/i 參數指定的目錄的目錄。

trans-unit.source: Add a path to the compiled resource file (.res) to your project's Application property page.
trans-unit.target: 將路徑加入至已編譯的資源檔 (.res) 專案的應用程式屬性頁面。

trans-unit.source: Write your provider.
trans-unit.target: 撰寫您的提供者。

trans-unit.source: The following steps show the calls made by a provider:
trans-unit.target: 下列步驟顯示提供者所進行的呼叫：

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSet.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor to define the counter set.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSet.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>建構函式來定義計數器集合。

trans-unit.source: Call this method for each counter set defined in the manifest.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法的每個計數器集合定義資訊清單中。

trans-unit.source: For each counter set, call one of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSet.AddCounter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods to add the counters to the set.
trans-unit.target: 針對每個計數器集合，請呼叫其中一種<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSet.AddCounter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>將計數器加入至集合的方法。

trans-unit.source: Call this method for each counter defined in the counter set.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法針對每個計數器集合中定義的計數器。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSet.CreateCounterSetInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to create an instance of the counter set (an instance contains the counter data).
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSet.CreateCounterSetInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法建立 （執行個體包含的計數器資料） 的計數器集合的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For single instance counter sets, call this method one time.
trans-unit.target: 為單一執行個體的計數器集合，請呼叫這個方法一次。

trans-unit.source: For multiple instance counter sets, call this method for each instance for which you need to provide counter data (use a unique name for each instance).
trans-unit.target: 若為多個執行個體的計數器集合，呼叫這個方法的每個您要提供 （使用每個執行個體的唯一名稱） 的計數器資料的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSetInstance.Counters%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to access and set the counter data for the counter.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSetInstance.Counters%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>存取和設定計數器的計數器資料的屬性。

trans-unit.source: After you finish your provider, use the LodCtr tool to register the counters on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 完成您的提供者之後，使用 LodCtr 工具註冊電腦上的計數器。

trans-unit.source: For example,
trans-unit.target: 例如，套用至物件的

trans-unit.source: The example assumes the manifest and executable file are in the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設在資訊清單和可執行檔會在目前的目錄。

trans-unit.source: For complete details on using the LodCtr, see [Microsoft Technet](Http://Go.Microsoft.Com/FWLink/?LinkId=84000).
trans-unit.target: 如需使用 LodCtr 完整的詳細資訊，請參閱[Microsoft Technet](Http://Go.Microsoft.Com/FWLink/?LinkId=84000)。

trans-unit.source: You can use the classes in this namespace on computers that run the Windows Vista and later operating systems.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在執行 Windows Vista 和更新版本的作業系統的電腦上的這個命名空間中使用類別。

trans-unit.source: The following shows a simple manifest:
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示簡單的資訊清單：

trans-unit.source: The following shows a simple provider implementation for the manifest:
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示在資訊清單的簡單提供者實作：
